attributes.action: Give Taxi Drivers and other public workers vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Make them a priority to get vaccine for over 50's now
attributes.background: Taxi Drivers are high risk workers who cannot social distance many have fallen ill or died with the virus

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Include public transport workers in priority groups for covid 19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564819

Prioritise professional drivers/public transport operators for vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569183

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
